variant.question: Given the following information, what is the Ground Speed of the aircraft? TAS: 300 kt Heading: 090° Wind: 330°/46 kt

- Distance between A and B: 360 NM

(Refer to the GSPRM Manual VFR CROATIA 3.5-1) What is the local time (LT) in Croatia in (i) Winter and (ii) Summer?

options.text: (i) LT = UTC + 1 hours (ii) LT = UTC + 2 hours
(i) LT = UTC -2 hours (ii) LT = UTC - 1  hours
(i) LT = UTC + 2 hours (ii) LT = UTC + 1 hours
(i) LT = UTC + 1 hours (ii) LT = UTC - 2 hours
